name: Stealth
Description: Advantage on Stealth tests

name: Charge
Description: Advantage on charge rolls

name: Climb
Description: Advantage on Climb tests

name: Deployment
Description: Deploy up to your move score outside of the zone

name: Dodge
Description: Opponent has disadvantage on attack. Move score reduced by 2

name: Jump
Description: Increase jump distance by 50%, can standing jump up to 50% of move

name: Slide
Description: Increase move by 25% must end up behind cover

name: Sprint
Description: Increase full move by 50%

name: Heavy Weapon
Description: Can operate weapons with the heavy trait

name: Long Shot
Description: All ranges increased by 25%

name: Thrown
Description: Double thrown range

name: Deadeye
Description: No disadvantage for shooting at a target behind cover

name: Hip Shot
Description: May take one shot at disadvantage after a full move action

name: Mighty Shot
Description: Add one to damage

name: Rapid Reload
Description: Ranged weapons with the quick trait can be shot twice in a turn

name: Defensive Shooting
Description: This turn your attacks have disadvantage and your defense has advantage

name: Two Weapon
Description: Can wield a weapon with the light trait in the off hand and gain +1 to attack

name: Two-Handed
Description: Can wield weapons that require two hands

name: Unarmed
Description: Gain + 1 to attack when unarmed

name: Counter Attack
Description: When receiving a charge, may make an attack at disadvantage

name: Disarm
Description: As an action make a melee check and if success, the enemy is disarmed

name: Defensive Fighting
Description: This turn, your attack as disadvantage, but defense has advantage

name: All out attack
Description: When attacking as a full action, gain one attack, and have disadvantage on defense

name: Quick Attack
Description: Gain one attack

name: Natural Leader
Description: All squad mates that you can see, have advantage on charisma rolls. All allies you can see have advantage on a single charisma test each turn

name: Cause Fear
Description: As an action, make a Charisma test vs an opponent you can see. If you win, they are afraid and have disadvantage on all rolls for the next turn

name: Motivator
Description: As an action, try and get an ally out of the fear state

name: Fear is fuel
Description: If you fail a fear test, you have advantage until the end of your turn, if you success, they have disadvantage for the rest of their turn

name: Inspiring
Description: As an action make a leadership test - on success all allies who can hear you have advantage on their next roll

name: Shrewd Negotiator
Description: Roll twice on after action battles, choose either result

name: Skill 7
Description: TBD

name: Skill 8
Description: TBD

name: Deployment
Description: You may deploy into alternate designated deploy zone

name: Observer
Description: Advantage on detecting hidden enemies

name: Tactical Awareness
Description: Always aware of where the objective is

name: Trap Detector
Description: Automatically aware of traps within alertness skill range -advantage otherwise

name: Medic
Description: Advantage on medicine tests to revive allies

name: Blind Fighting
Description: No disadvantage for fighting blind

name: Combat Awareness
Description: Use Alertness instead of Speed for Initiative

name: Press the Advantage
Description: TBD

name: Double Shot
Description: Ranged weapons with the quick trait can be fired twice

name: Quick Draw
Description: Weapons with the small trait can be drawn for free

name: Initiative
Description: Advantage on initiative rolls

name: Escape Artist
Description: TBD

name: Catlike Grace
Description: TBD

name: Object use
Description: Can use objects with the simple trait as a free action

name: Deployment
Description: Can deploy up to your speed score outside of the deploy zone

name: Fast Hands
Description: Securing an objective is now only an action

name: Spartan Kick
Description: As an action kick an opponent, on success that person is knocked back up to half strength

name: Berserk Charge
Description: TBD

name: Heavy weapon expert
Description: May move and shoot Weapons on the same with the Heavy trait

name: Stationary weapon handler
Description: May fire a Stationary weapon on the same turn it is setup

name: Physique
Description: Add one to all charisma checks

name: Throw Person
Description: Instead of rolling damage to a melee'd opponent, you may throw them D8 away from you in any direction

name: Create Cover
Description: Large pieces of debris can be stood up and hidden behind

name: Destroy Cover
Description: Create a hole in cover that can be shot or have an object thrown into

name: Iron Jaw
Description: Reduce the strength of incoming damage by one

name: Gritty
Description: Advantage on Pin tests

name: Stalwart
Description: Advantage on Charge Defense

name: Feel No Pain
Description: May still take one action when pinned

name: Rub Some Dirt On It
Description: Once per battle, can get back up without aid

name: Indestructible
Description: After action, move down one rank on the wound scale

name: Intestinal fortitude
Description: Can listen to k-pop without barfing

name: Patient
Description: Can set an ambush more than one turn into the future
